import axios from"axios";export default{// Searches the NYT books according to the search criteria given in the form
getNewBooks:function getNewBooks(title){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q="+title);},// Gets saved Books
getSavedBooks:function getSavedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books/");},// Deletes the Book with the given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id);},// Saves a Book to the database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("/api/books",bookData);}};
